directions: Combine the tomato soup, diced tomatoes, water, and milk in a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir in Gorgonzola cheese, garlic, basil, and onion powder. Reduce heat to low; simmer 15 to 20 minutes, stirring often.
ingredients: 2 (14.5 ounce) cans Italian-style diced tomatoes, undrained
title: Cream of Tomato Gorgonzola Soup
